p: BC discs after impregnation with OEO were weighed on an analytical balance (accurate to 0.0001 g, Radwag, Warsaw, Poland). OEO holding capacity was calculated by the formula (1) [ 40]: OEO holding capacity (%) = (W h − W d)/W d × 100 (1) where W h is the weight of the hydrate BC disc and W d is the weight of the dry BC disc; each measurement was carried out in triplicate.
